name: Epilectris (Old Version)
description:
Old version of a tetris game Jose (graphic designer) and I (programmer) made. There's an updated version of it, with many gameplay differences but, alas, I can not find it in my computer.

I always loved tetris, and when I was a kid, I used to play a lot of shareware games, many of which were different versions of tetris. I always wanted to do my own, and here it is. A bit slow at the begining, but it has an unexpected twist on the higher levels.
